title: Does a ‘Muslim Migrant’ from Syria with Four Wives, 23 Children Receive $390,000 a Year in Benefits?
subtitle: Reports that a Syrian refugee was receiving close to $400,000 annually were based on incomplete information.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A Syrian refugee receives close to $400,000 in benefits a year from the German government in order to take care of his wives and children.
